entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump But he'll make his base gather in Tulsa when Covid-19 illness is on the rise. His people under the instruction of some White House flunky remove all the public safety signs designed to keep citizens safe. And did so by going against the wishes of the facility.
